source.name: filter
source.instructions: **What is the purpose of the edge enhance filter?**

answers.answer: To create a high-contrast, black-and-white image
To soften the image by reducing noise and details
To highlight the edges of objects in the image, making them more distinct and pronounced
To trace the edges of objects in the image

source.guidance: The edge enhance filter is used to highlight the edges of objects in the image, making them more distinct and pronounced. This filter can be used to create a more stylized or artistic effect.
